    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:atlas.fri.uni-lj.si:trubar1:uciteljska/112020</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>

            <entry>trubar1:uciteljska/112020</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Lov na številke</string>
            <string language="en">Hunting the numbers</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Jagd die Zahlen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Chasse les nombres</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Caça os números</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Cercare i numeri</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κυνήγι των αριθμών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Caza los números</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Prosojnica je primerna za sprostitev.</string>
            <string language="en">Power point presentation turned into fun game that helps drilling addition and subtraction.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">seštevanje</string>
            <string language="en">addition</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">logika</string>
            <string language="en">logic</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">odštevanje</string>
            <string language="en">subtraction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">zabava</string>
            <string language="en">fun</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schalten Sie die Punktdarstellung an, die zu 
Spaßspiel gemacht wird, das hilft, Hinzufügung und Abzug zu bohren.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Actionnez la présentation de point transformée en
jeu d'amusement qui aide à forer l'ajout et la soustraction.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Power a apresentação do ponto girada no jogo do 
divertimento que ajuda perfurar a adição e a subtração.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Alimenti la presentazione del punto trasformata nel
gioco di divertimento che contribuisce a perforare l'aggiunta e la 
sottrazione.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η παρουσίαση Power Point μετατράπηκε σε παιχνίδι 
διασκέδασης που βοηθά την προσθήκη και την αφαίρεση με τρυπάνι.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Accione la presentación de la punta dada vuelta en
el juego de la diversión que ayuda a perforar la adición y la 
substracción.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hinzufügung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Logik</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Abzug</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Spaß</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">ajout</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">logique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">soustraction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">amusement</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">adição</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">lógica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">subtração</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">divertimento</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">προσθήκη</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">λογική</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">αφαίρεση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">διασκέδαση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>
